text: Asked for a collaborative editor solution with Julia support; some people here recommended VS Code Live, which we now tried out. In principle it seems OK-ish, but a major bummer so far was the weird "follow focus" behavior. E.g. I press "return" to insert a newline, and WHAM the view jumps somewhere (I suspect: where the other user is looking at?). I found a command to "follow user", which I think means we follow their cursor and/or view... but I found no way to "unfollow" / to simply keep my editor view centered on my own cursor... Is this normal? Anybody got a hint what to do about this?
